Title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica: Concept Movie
Description: ["A short four-minute concept film that served as a surprise unveil at Studio SHAFT's 40th anniversary event in Winter 2015, Madogatari. The concept movie is the core of a new ", Madoka Magica, ' project, and serves as its trailer. The second short was later screened in Osaka, with the difference being a replacement of several imageboard segments.']
Staff: [['Shinbou, Akiyuki', 'Director, Storyboard'], ['Miyamoto, Yukihiro', 'Director, Episode Director'], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', 'Sound Director'], ['Kajiura, Yuki', 'Music']]
